colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES BYIN RLABS KYI GTER CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED MAR PO LHA BCU GSUM GYI DKYIL 'KHOR GYI SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB MYUR STZOL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSOD NAMS STOBS KYIS MNGON PAR 'PHAGS SHING LHA MCHOG 'DI NYID YI DAM GYI LHAR BSTEN PA'I SA SKYONG MI'I TZOD PAN DAM PAR GYUR BA DED T'A GUNG TA LA'I TSE TSENG JO NANG TSE BRTAN DON GRUB RDO RJE'I MTSAN CAN GANG DES LHA MCHOG 'DI NYID KYI SGRUB THABS RGYAS PA RGYUN DU MI LCOGS PAR 'DUG PAS, LHAN SKYES KYI SGRUB THABS LAS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA BZHIN, GRUB CHEN MI TRA'I GZHUNG LHAN THABS DANG BCAS PA GZHIR BZUNG, KHA 'GENGS 'OS RNAMS LUGS SROL 'DI KHA'I DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG JI LTAR RIGS PAS BRGYAN NAS RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM ZHING LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN KHO NAS NYE BAR 'TSO BA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES DBEN GNAS BRAG RI KUN TU SBYIN PA GLING DU NYE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE'I GROGS DAN BYED PA PO NI RIN CHEN RDO RJE'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
